title: My Son is Rushing Into Marriage
description:
Josh is not sure what to say to his 19-year-old son who recently moved away with the military and now wants to marry a girl he met on a dating app. - Dr. Laura: "Parents should bluntly lay out the truth to their kids."

What words of wisdom have you shared with your children today? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
